post.body: Hungry, Hungry Hippos is an awesome game!
HAHA yes she's new to Twitter and hasn't caught on the concept of meeting new ppl online. Great kid :P Moving to Brisbane!
LOL that's the way! Happy Christmas to you! Party is ending now to as sister @rock_pig + @George2390 are of to bed. I might blog.
a white Russian
a Sex on the Beach cocktail
Ah, okay. No rush! Plenty of time, dude :)
Unfortunately so. It is the most current Christmas CD we have. Thank god it's only heard once a year.
LOL it's on Australia Day, January 26th. I'm in NSW until the 6th, dude! It would be a Aussie/JJJ party.
Email alilspaz AT gmail.com your contact and venue details and leave the rest to me! Any suggestions or ideas would be rad too.
Sounds rad. Wouldn't be impromptu though as we have weeks to prepare instead of hours or minutes. Hehe. Let's do it!
YES. Family have that album playing here too. It's just hilarious now.
Really? That's even better! My flat on the park would be too small for everyone.
I have my frock on. It's teal. Woo!
Watching The Office (US) with @rock_pig
Triple J Hottest 100: Why don't we have a BTUB party? Would anyone come to Guyatt Park in St Lucia for a BBQ?
Have promised family tickets to Top Gear UK Live but have just found out they are $94 minimum. Damn, yo.
Uploading photos from camera to laptop as memory card is already out of gas! @rock_pig + @george2390 got some great reaction footage :)
Can't wait to get sewing machine up and running. SQUEE!! Who wants to teach/learn with me when I get back to #Brisbane?
Sewing machine, mug, $20, lottery ticket, precious stone, Daisy by Marc Jacobs, lincraft voucher & pair Xmas hand towels. What did you get?
Happy Christmas, everyone. Best wishes for tomorrow & enjoy the giving & good times which come with this kick-arse day. Rock on!
